name: The Tower (itch) (Ermdad)
description:
This game was created for the 3rd GoedWare game jam with the theme "Enhance" . 

For the full experience please download the FULL GFX version , the webgl version is for convenience however in this you do not get the online leaderboards and will have scaled down graphics. The LOW GFX version is for PCs that don't have a gpu (i.e my work laptop) any PC with a gpu shouldnt have an issue with the FULL GFX version.

Buy slots on your tower and  then click and drag units on to enhance its defences against the hoards of slime. Units can be moved from slot to slot so a good tip is to have more slots than units and get the most of out each unit by shifting their position during the waves. 

Everything in the game can be sold so don't be affraid to ditch some old troops or positions if it means getting a stronger unit or a better position.

Have fun playing and defend your way to the top of the Leaderboards!

Everything in this game from assets to code was made from scratch by myself , the only things I have had to outsource was the sound clips and music which is all from mixkit.co
